meanings.definition: The quality or state of being without flaws or defects.
meanings.sent1: Her flawlessness in the dance performance impressed everyone.
meanings.sent2: The flawlessness of the diamond made it highly valuable.
meanings.sent3: Despite his best efforts, his attempt at flawlessness in cooking ended in a burnt dinner.
meanings.sent4: The flawlessness of the plan was evident in its flawless execution.
meanings.sent5: The flawlessness of the snow-covered landscape took her breath away.

meanings.definition: The act of being perfect or impeccable.
meanings.sent1: His flawlessness in public speaking made him a sought-after speaker.
meanings.sent2: The flawlessness of her performance earned her a standing ovation.
meanings.sent3: In his quest for flawlessness, he ironed his shirt five times to ensure no creases.
meanings.sent4: The flawlessness of her smile brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The flawlessness of the sunset painted the sky in vibrant colors.
